Linguist.description: Big on letters and words, linguists centre their travels around names of places.

Transporter.description: Obsessed with how they get from place to place, transporters think a lot about planes, trains, and automobiles.

Geometer.description: In love with the shape of paths, geometers care about how the route twists and turns.

Numbers.description: Tables are their best friends, and numbers people care about populations, capitals, and lat/lon.

Avoider.description: Scared of new experiences, avoiders have requirements about where not to go and where to pass through.

Killjoy.description: Every family has one -- killjoys are here to put limits on costs, distances, and number of places visited.

Spender.description: The opposite of killjoys, costly family members want it all and they want it now.
